issue.title: [Rust] Add benchmark based on TPC-H
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9711](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9711). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We need better benchmarks for testing at scale, so TPC benchmarks are ideal since data can be generated at different scale factors. TPC-H seems like a good fit for Arrow so I would like to contribute a benchmark based on that.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9711?focusedCommentId=17177966) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7946
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7946>
